statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.StoreType , AA.Url , AA.Hosts , AA.Description , AA.ImageID
, M1.Name as StoreTypeName
FROM dbo.TStore AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.StoreType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'StoreType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TStore AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TStore ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, StoreType, Url, Hosts, UseYn, Description, ImageID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #StoreType#, #Url#, #Hosts#, #UseYn#, #Description#, #ImageID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TStore SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , StoreType = #StoreType# , Url = #Url# , Hosts = #Hosts# , Description = #Description# , UseYn = #UseYn# , ImageID = #ImageID# WHERE ID = #ID#
